tha-ap396:15.2: Sampupphite → supupphite (sya1ed, sya2ed); samphīte (pts-vp-pli1) | sañchanne → vappadese (sya1ed, sya2ed); ca chappade (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap396:16.1: Majjhe mahante hīne ca → majjhe mayhaṃ bhavā assu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap396:16.2: bhave sabbe atikkamiṃ → ye bhave samatikkamiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); yo bhavesu pakittayi (mr)
